attributes.action: Northern Ireland granted Independence from the United Kingdom and Republic of Ireland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is for anyone who thinks that Northern Ireland deserves full independence from both the U.K. and Ireland. A resolution should be formed, stating Northern Ireland's country independence, but with both Ireland and the U.K. providing Economic and Military Aid

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
